title: Irina Shayk looks sensational as she attends Intimissimi fashion show in Italy
text:
She's one of the fashion industry's most in-demand models.

And Irina Shayk looked nothing short of sensational as she attended the White Cabaret by Intimissimi autumn/winter fashion show in Verona, Italy on Tuesday.

The Russian beauty, 33, cut a stylish figure at the event where she donned a black sheer shirt dress with a low-cut neckline.

Event: Irina Shayk, 33, looked nothing short of sensational as she attended the White Cabaret by Intimissimi autumn/winter fashion show in Verona, Italy on Tuesday

Irina, who has modelled for Intimissimi in the past, cinched her waist with a black belt while she added height to her frame with a pair of thigh-high matching boots.

Styling her brunette locks into a chic updo, the model completed her look for the evening with a white handbag.

Joining Irina at the event was actress Sarah Jessica Parker who showed off her stellar sense of style in a black jumpsuit with sheer sleeves.

The Sex And The City star, 54, also wore a pair of black shoes with a shimmering diamond embellishment and carried a matching bag.

Fashion: The Russian beauty cut a stylish figure at the event where she donned a black sheer shirt dress with a low-cut neckline

Letting her blonde tresses fall loose down her shoulders for the evening, Sarah added a further touch of glamour to her ensemble with silver earrings.

The ladies looked in high spirits as they posed for a snap together and enjoyed the show from the front row where they sat alongside Italian designer Chiara Ferragni.

Irina recently discussed her career and family in an interview with People magazine.

'Sometimes different work and personal life things come up and you want to go full on Russian,' she said. 'My mom said one thing to me that I remember from many years ago … "Whatever happens in life, remember you have to be a lady."'

Beauty: Irina styled her brunette locks into a chich updo for the evening

Frow: Iriana and Sarah Jessica enjoyed the show from the front row where they sat alongside Italian designer Chiara Ferragni

Interview: Irina recently said she was 'so lucky to be working' in the challenging industry and credited ageing with her stellar career

Irina said she was 'so lucky to be working' in the challenging industry and credited ageing with her stellar career.

'I think women are like a good wine: better with age, wiser and [make] better decisions in life,' she said.

'I think a woman just has to feel she never ages inside. It’s all about personality. It’s all about how you take life in and send the energy out there.'

Ensemble: Sarah Jessica also wore a pair of black shoes with a shimmering diamond embellishment and carried a matching bag

The beauty is adjusting to life as a working single mother following her split from ex-fiance, Hollywood actor Bradley Cooper, 44, in June after four years together.

The former couple have amicably agreed to share custody of their daughter Lea de Seine, two, and have both decided to live in New York so they can easily co-parent.

The model is said to be in no rush to move on from the relationship, and has reportedly told friends she is not yet ready to date again.
